head.title: Split {{FileFormatUp}} documents in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to split {{FileFormatUp}} to separate files. Manipulate with your PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Visio files, images, archives, and more with our solutions.

header.title: Split {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} is designed to bring document processing features to {{EnvNameShort}} applications. Process documents in popular business formats with features like split {{FileFormatUp}} files.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful document processing library supporting over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It enables merging, splitting, extracting, moving, swapping, and removing pages, enhancing document management in your applications.

more_features.title: Powerful document content management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides a comprehensive set of features for processing over 50 popular business file formats efficiently.

feature_1.title: Merge various file formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, Visio diagrams, images, and archives. Use customization options for optimal results.

feature_2.title: Manage document pages
feature_2.content: Rearrange pages by moving, swapping, or deleting them to better organize your content.

feature_3.title: Control page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to a specific angle or switch between portrait and landscape orientations.

feature_4.title: Extract pages as separate files
feature_4.content: Select a single page or a range of pages and save them as a new file in a specified location.

formats.title: Split various file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, allowing you to modify documents effortlessly with a wide range of operations.

operations.title: Key features
operations.description: Explore the powerful features provided by our document processing library.

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is able to split {{FileFormatUp}} documents saving selected pages as a new file. Use our document management capabilities in your {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_2: Select file path for splitting result.
content.step_3: Use options to set up operation parameters.
content.step_4: Split file and save to the desired location.

code_1.title: Split {{FileFormatUp}} doc saving all even pages
code_1.content: Check out this example to be informed how to split {{FileFormatUp}} document and save all even-numbered pages to a separate file.
code_1.comment_1: Load the source file into the constructor
code_1.comment_3: Retrieve the total number of pages
code_1.comment_4: Create split options for all even pages
code_1.comment_5: Split and save the result file
